summary: The module defines an Approximate Personalized Propagation of Neural Predictions (APPNP) layer that integrates personalized PageRank‑based message passing into graph neural networks, and includes example code to train and assess the model on the Cora citation graph using DGL’s sparse utilities.
business_intent: Provide a reference implementation and demonstration of a graph neural network architecture that leverages personalized propagation for node classification, useful for research, education, and prototyping of GNN solutions.
